venue.name: Lucky Dog Day Care (Inside the Pawsitive Canine Camp building)

item.description:
Hi everyone!

Kim (Gruden and Diesel's mom) had a great idea for this month's meetup:

"The owner of Gruden & Diesel's day care (in Milford) has generously offered us her facility one Saturday a month at the times we specify for only $5 per dog.

The building has an open back door so the dogs can go in or out and lots of toys to play with. And for us, we get to stay inside and visit, rather than chill to the bones outside."

If you'd like to attend, please "RSVP" yes to this event. Directions to the location will be posted soon!

Oh, and feel free to dress your adorable pups in Halloween garb! There will be prizes for the best costumes!!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DIRECTIONS:

Lucky Dog Day Care
Inside the Pawsitive Canine Camp building
80 Sumner St
Milford

Rt. 495 south to Exit 20 (Rt 85)
Take a Right off the exit.
At the first set of lights (Wendy's will be on right) take a right onto Dilla Street
Take first left (less than 1 mile, immediately after lake) onto Sumner Street
Pawsitive Canine Camp is the first bldg on the right.
Parking is immediately after the bldg on the right.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

group.name: The Worcester English Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: October Bulldog Meetup - Halloween Fun!
